message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.SE

The paper discusses the security challenges in the IoT, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also proposes the use of machine learning (ML) and software-defined networking (SDN) to address these challenges, which are subfields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI), respectively. Additionally, the paper discusses the need for proactive threat mitigation and secure-by-design approaches, which are related to system and software engineering (cs.SE) and control systems (cs.SY).
